name: The Wise Defense
description:
Gliwise Studio is an indie gamedev team, formed by students of Videogame Design and Development in Rey Juan Carlos University

Our team
  • Fernando Expósito Arribas - Artist
  • Sergio García Delgado - Programmer
  • Aurora García Raigón - Programmer
  • Alejandro García Rodriguez de Lizana - Game Designer, Scrum Master
  • Daniel Jiménez Morales - Programmer
  • David Rodríguez Rives - Artist
